verses.verse: "How long will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5766>unjustly,<s%> and <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H8199>"Defend<s%> the <S%H1800>weak,<s%> the poor, and the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%> Maintain the <S%H6663>rights<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H7326>oppressed.<s%>
<S%H6403>Rescue<s%> the <S%H1800>weak<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%> <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>"

They <S%H3045>don't<s%> know, neither do they <S%H995>understand.<s%> They <S%H1980>walk<s%> back and forth in <S%H2825>darkness.<s%> All the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H430>gods,<s%> all of you are <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
<S%H403>Nevertheless<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> like <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8269>rulers.<s%>"
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> for you <S%H5157>inherit<s%> all of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
